responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "EDC6C591490AA9D1B0215EA14A1009A5", "A guard near the Vanguard Spire has informed me that the memorial was built in honor of the first wave of settlers to return to Verra through the Gateway. He stated that four of the great gems placed onto the memorial were stolen by nearby goblin creepers. If Ishould obtain the gems, I am to return them to the Vanguard Sentry, esteemed silent watch of the memorial. ")
name: SQ_0003_TheVanguardSpire_3
